name: algorithm
description:
NAME
ALGORITHM - graph traversal DFS or DFS algorithm

SYNOPSIS
ALGORITHM [-h]
ALGORITHM -d graphname
ALGORITHM -b Prufer code

DESCRIPTION
ALGORITHM coding or decoding your tree graph with method Prufer code
Example of coding Prufer:
1221
Example of decoding Prufer:
0 1 1
1 0 0
1 0 0
COMMAND-LINE OPTIONS
-h, --help - option that shows this text
-c, --coding - 'description'
-d, --decoding - 'description'
